content: Yes, some coffee shops in Seattle do offer pumpkin spice latte or similar fall-flavored drinks during the autumn season. If you're a fan of pumpkin spice, you might want to check out Starbucks, which offers their famous pumpkin spice latte every fall. Many other Seattle coffee shops also offer pumpkin-flavored drinks, such as pumpkin spice cappuccinos or pumpkin spice lattes. Be sure to check out some of the local coffee shops' seasonal menus to see what flavors they are offering during your visit.
